Reviews.Title: great deal
Reviews.Author: jackie
Reviews.Content: My plan phone was ruined at a beach party and I wasn't due for an upgrade for many months. This was a great deal and a good phone! Amazon shipped it super fast and I couldn't be happier with the phone

Reviews.Title: Works so far!
Reviews.Author: Hank
Reviews.Content: Just got mine in the mail today.  Took less than a week to ship and arrived right on time.  Bought mine used from "Teczilla" and it was in better condition than I expected; it hardly shows any signs of use.  It's an unlocked AT&T; phone and works with my T-mobile SIM card.  It has a setup wizard that provides everything you need for basic setup.  The price is great, even if you are buying it new.  I will edit or comment this review in about 2-3 weeks to confirm my satisfaction as that seems to be when most defective phones start to act up.

Reviews.Title: Was very Surprised !
Reviews.Author: Georgia Gibson "Georgie"
Reviews.Content: My daughter kept breaking and losing phones so I  thought it would be a better idea to by just a cheap phone . It came and looked better than refurb , I could not believe the shape the phone was in ! Looked almost new and worked like a charm!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: Its a very nice phone, I was not expecting it to be in that great condition but it looking like new

Reviews.Title: I got what I paid for.
Reviews.Author: Sheryl D. Taylor
Reviews.Content: Needed a phone to use since I washed mine.  This one served to fill in the gap until I could buy what I wanted.

Reviews.Title: Good Phone to have
Reviews.Author: guillermo
Reviews.Content: ok for the most part.. very durable, wish phone were still made as durable. I use it mostly for work....

Reviews.Title: Used
Reviews.Author: MARLON
Reviews.Content: The phone was ok but I did not get a battery with the phone and I had to request and battery from the company. The packer should have caught that.

Reviews.Title: blacbery curve 8310
Reviews.Author: pat swann
Reviews.Content: The phone made a lot of buzzing noise and people couldnt hear me or i couldnt here them, like it had a losse speaker in it.you had to tap it to make the noise go away.Threw it in the trash .:(

Reviews.Title: Good phones, poor batteries
Reviews.Author: Matthew L Cantrell
Reviews.Content: Ordered two of these and they came from Wireless Warehouse in Michigan.  I ordered on a Friday, and wasn't expecting them to arrive for a week, but they were on my doorstep in Arkansas the next Monday afternoon.  Nice.  They were well packaged with everything separated by bubble rack.  Both phones looked new inside and out and had protective peel-off film on screen and back.  Put them together with the two batteries that were included and put them on to charge overnight.  Next day, still nothing but the battery with a red slash emblem on the screen.  Fortunately, my wife (who I bought these for) still had her old Blackberry batteries and when we put them in both phones fired right up as normal.  Keep in mind these were genuine Blackberry batteries that hadn't been charged in over a year (but weigh twice as much as the included batteries).So far, both of them are working great, but the battery thing was a bit annoying.  I thought the $40 price was fair, especially considering how good they looked upon arrival, and I wouldn't have minded paying something more for a good battery.  If my wife hadn't had those available, I'd have had to drop $34 at my local battery store for one I knew to be fresh (Li-Ion batteries age in their packages from the time of manufacture, which is why you can get some many online super cheap).

Reviews.Title: Bad key
Reviews.Author: bao
Reviews.Content: The little white circle in the middle doesn't function right. It can not go up when pushed to go up.

Reviews.Title: Blackberry Curve 8310
Reviews.Author: Lynn Miller
Reviews.Content: Nothing holds a candle to the blackberry! Very attractive phone. Speaker is loud and clear. Texting is fast. International and domestic calls are clear with good reception. Lynn Miller in La Jolla, CA

Reviews.Title: I'm going back to Samsung
Reviews.Author: Jason E Gamble
Reviews.Content: The one I received seemed more geared to AT&T; than T-Mobile.  Some profiles did not work and the scratches in the interior made me wonder if it was damaged during or before refurbishing.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: norma fyke
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my needs. calls and a few texts. Only complaint is that  it did not come with the USB cable to connect to computer. Luckily my husband had one. If I had of known I would have ordered one at the time of purchase. Great phone otherwise......

Reviews.Title: horrible
Reviews.Author: Davon Proctor
Reviews.Content: I dont like it because the sd slot is missing and the other person have a hard time hearing you.

Reviews.Title: Came in good but....
Reviews.Author: Octavio
Reviews.Content: I love blackberry for it's voice activator, the phone worked great at first but suddenly just stopped responding to the dial voice activator , I turned it off and went back to my touch phone which I hate so much...

Reviews.Title: was supposed to be unlocked for Team Mobile but was only for ATT
Reviews.Author: JERRY
Reviews.Content: This was supposed to unlocked phone for either Team Mobile or ATT, but when it arrived it would not work for Team Mobile just ATT. Which makes this phone unusable for me. I wish the vendors would state the truth. This is is the first ever item from Amazon thaT DIDN"T DO WHAT IT SAID IT WOULD

ProductInfo.Features:
This unlocked cell phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile.
2G GSM: 850 / 900 / 1800 / 1900
QWERTY keyboard, Trackball navigation, Blackberry Maps
Camera: 2 MP, 1600x1200 pixels, LED flash.
Document viewer (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF), Media player (MP4/WMV/H.263/H.264/MP3/WAV/eAAC+/WMA), Organizer.
ProductInfo.Name: Blackberry Curve 8310 Unlocked Cell Phone
